description.narrative: By 2016, capacity of relevant government bodies, enhanced in the area of child protection IMS, monitoring of social services, monitoring and reporting on CRC, rules/regulations/policies, human resources development related to child protection

sector.narrative: Administrative data and Information Management System (IMS) including CPIMS+, GBVIMS+, MRMIMS+
Alternative care reform and service provision
Birth Registration/Civil Registration and Vital Statistics systems
CRC, CEDAW or CRPD - follow up on concluding observations
Child Protection humanitarian AoR/humanitarian sector coordination
ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty
Protective services for children on the move
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order human rights affairs
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2016 Bangladesh: Evaluation of the UNICEF Child Protection Programme 2012-16
2019 Bangladesh: Evaluation of Gender in the UNICEF Bangladesh Country Programme 2017-2020

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, capacity of relevant government bodies, enhanced in the area of child protection IMS, monitoring of social services, monitoring and reporting on CRC, rules/regulations/policies, human resources development related to child protection

description.narrative: Ministerial and education officials and social workers' capacity enhanced in child protection policies and services provision, including in cases of child protection | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: Number of Social Services Courses accredited by National Social Service Academy (NSSA)

actual.value: 2016:2 Social Services Courses accredited by NSSA (BSST and PSST)

title.narrative: National strategy for adolescents' empowerment adopted by MoWCA

actual.value: 2016:Divisional Level consultations with adolescents and duty bearers completed.

title.narrative: % of new-borns registered within 45 days of birth in UNDAF districts

actual.value: 2016:2.78 % (Best performing district - Sunamganj: 5.27%, worst performing district – Gaibanda: 1.37%)

title.narrative: # of child laws/provisions/policies revised to make them compatible with international standards

baseline.value: 3 (Children's Act 2013, Amendment of Birth and Death Registration Act, List of Harzadous forms of Child labor)

target.value: 2016:7 (Rules of 2013 Children's Act, Adolescent Strategy, Child Marriage Restaint Act, Minimal Age of Criminal Responsibility)

actual.value: 2016:Draft rules pending with MoLJPA for vetting, draft Child Marriage Restraint Act vetting completed and awaiting further approval by the Cabinet. UNICEF is working on: Rulesof 2013 Children Act, Adolescent Strategy, Child Marriage Restraint Act, Minimal Age of Criminal Responsibility.
